articles.title: Taiwanese singer A-Lin kicking off world tour in Singapore in May with large-scale concert - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Her A-Link with Passengers World Tour 2022 will be at the Singapore Indoor Stadium on May 28. Tickets go on sale on Apr 11.
articles.content:
A-Lin was last in Singapore in 2019 for a concert.
Her upcoming show will include fan favourites as well as tracks from her newest album, LINK, which took four and a half years to complete.

articles.title: The 10 best films of martial arts star Jimmy Wang Yu, who has died aged 79 - South China Morning Post
articles.description: The biggest action star in Asian cinema in the 1960s, Jimmy Wang Yu’s success in films such as One-Armed Swordsman and The Chinese Boxer paved the way for fellow martial arts actors including Bruce Lee.
